flow.informationArchitecture: Transaction ID (hash) at top, status immediately below, transaction-specific metrics organized as label-value pairs, technical details (size, weight, version) in lower section, educational callout about SegWit benefits at bottom
frictionPoints: Long transaction hash may require horizontal scroll on mobile
Multiple technical fields (LOCK TIME, REPLACE BY FEE, SEGWIT SAVINGS) may confuse non-technical users
Screen cuts off at bottom, implying more content requires scrolling
progressIndicators: STATUS field shows 'Unconfirmed', indicating transaction is pending

copy.headline: Transaction

microcopy.purpose: Educational field showing benefit of SegWit upgrade
Estimated time to confirmation with fee rate context

microcopy.text: This transaction saved 36% on fees by upgrading to native SegWit-

dataFormatting: Transaction fees: 0.00000019 BTC (0.14 sat/vB) (cyan numbers with unit conversion)
Virtual Size: 140 vB (white numeric with unit)
Weight Units: 557 WU (white numeric with unit)
trustSignals: Technical detail completeness (fee rate, size, weight shown)
SegWit upgrade benefits highlighted (36% savings)
Explicit fee calculation transparency (sat/vB rate disclosed)

typography.dataStyle: Right-aligned white text with technical units in parentheses (e.g., BTC, sat/vB, vB, WU)
